definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 三代遗传的宗法制度毋宁是儒家文化的深厚社会基础。

sentences.english: Patriarchal clan system and its cultural patterns are the core of china's traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 宗法制度及其文化形态是中国传统文化的核心。

sentences.english: There is no equivalent for a girl, but in adeeply patriarchal society that doesn’t matter.
sentences.chinese: 对女孩没有这样的话，但在一个宗法社会里也不重要。

sentences.english: It was the feudal rules and patriarch moral that led to their tragical fates.
sentences.chinese: 是封建礼教和宗法道德筑就了她们的悲剧命运。

sentences.english: China is a country under the domination of the patriarchal religion power.
sentences.chinese: 中国历史上曾是一个被宗法式教权统治的国家。

sentences.english: The Confucianism culture was based on the patriarchal society and small-scale peasant economy.
sentences.chinese: 儒家文化产生的基础是宗法社会和小农经济。

sentences.english: It is thus clear that the residual influences of clannishness must not be underestimated.
sentences.chinese: 可见宗法观念的余毒决不能轻视。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese society is the patriarchal society founded on the patriarchal system.
sentences.chinese: 中国古代社会是根据宗法制度建立起来的宗法社会。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese society is the patriarchal society founded on the patriarchal system.
sentences.chinese: 中国古代社会是根据宗法制度建立起来的宗法社会。

sentences.english: Kins disperse to different places, which has a great impact on the patriarchal clan system.
sentences.chinese: 家族散之四方，给根深蒂固的宗法制度以有力的冲击。

sentences.english: This incident was quickly relayed to Master Yinzong; .
sentences.chinese: 这件事很快传到印宗法师耳中。

sentences.english: The Huns society is a nomadic patriarchal slave society in essence.
sentences.chinese: 匈奴社会实质上是游牧宗法奴隶制社会。

sentences.english: "Shengming Pavilion" is the witness of controlling on the villagers by the patriarchal clan system.
sentences.chinese: 村中的“申明亭”是宗法制度管理村民方式的见证。

definition: Confucian school, founded by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] (551-479 BC) and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] (c. 372-c. 289 BC)

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)

Legalist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC) founded by Han Fei 韓非|韩非[Han2 Fei1] and Li Si 李斯[Li3 Si1], later adopted by Shang Yang 商鞅[Shang1 Yang1] whose reforms helped establish the supremacy of the Qin Dynasty 秦代[Qin1 dai4] (221-207 BC)
